imagingbook.common.image.access

Packages that use imagingbook.common.image.access
Package
Description
imagingbook.common.image
 
imagingbook.common.image.access
 
imagingbook.common.image.interpolation
 
  • Classes in imagingbook.common.image.access used by imagingbook.common.image
    Class
    Description
    ImageAccessor
    An 'image accessor' is a wrapper around some ImageProcessor object to allow unified (read and write) access to its pixels values.
  • Classes in imagingbook.common.image.access used by imagingbook.common.image.access
    Class
    Description
    FloatAccessor
    Image accessor for scalar images with 32-bit (float) values.
    ImageAccessor
    An 'image accessor' is a wrapper around some ImageProcessor object to allow unified (read and write) access to its pixels values.
    RgbAccessor
    A special vector-valued image accessor for RGB images (direct subclass of VectorAccessor) with depth = 3 color components.
    ScalarAccessor
    The common (abstract) super-class for all image accessors to scalar-valued images.
    ShortAccessor
    Image accessor for scalar images with 16-bit (short) values.
    VectorAccessor
    Accessor for vector-valued images with arbitrary depth (number of components).
  • Classes in imagingbook.common.image.access used by imagingbook.common.image.interpolation
    Class
    Description
    ScalarAccessor
    The common (abstract) super-class for all image accessors to scalar-valued images.
